title: Intercept
description: The Intercept tab displays individual HTTP & HTTPS requests and responses that have been intercepted. This works as a middle man between browser and target application and let you Intercept, inspect, and modify the raw traffic passing in both directions.

title: Repeater
description: Repeater is a simple tool for manually manipulating and reissuing individual HTTP and WebSocket messages, and analyzing the applicationâ€™s responses. Repeater can be used to repeat the requests on the same URL with different parameters.

title: Intruder
description: Intruder is a tool for automating customized attacks against web applications. It is extremely powerful and configurable, and can be used to perform a huge range of tasks, from simple brute-force guessing of web directories through to active exploitation of complex blind SQL injection vulnerabilities.
